Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Albany
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Kedzie, Bryn Mawr, California and Foster, due to street blockage near Foster/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Foster, Kedzie, Bryn Mawr, California and Foster, due to street blockage near Foster/Albany.

Allow extra travel time.
